#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	while(b>0)
	{
		long long int c=a%b;
		a=b;
		b=c;
	}
	return a;
}
int main(){
	int t; 
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		while(gcd(a,b)!=1)
		{
			b=b/gcd(a,b);
		}
		if(b==1)
		  cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		 cout<<"No"<<endl;  
	}
	return 0;
}
